Explore Bangkok-Pattaya in 4 Days
content:
Make your Thailand tour exciting with our exclusive 3 night, 4day holiday package only at BDT. 12,400. Join us to get the best travel packages for Thailand.

Package Includes

  • Meet and Greet at the Airport

details: Discover Thailand magic only at BDT. 12,400

title: Discover Exceptional Beauty of Kathmandu-Nagarkot in 4 Days.
content:
Make your Nepal tour exciting with our exclusive 3 night, 4day package only at BDT. 12,400.Join us to get the best travel packages for Thailand.

Package Includes

  • Pickup and Drop at the Airport.
  • Nepali-style traditional welcome at the Airport with Khada or mala.
  • A dedicated tour assistant will assist you throughout your travel .
  • 2-night accommodation in Kathmandu on BB basis on a Twin/Triple sharing basis
  • 1-night accommodation in Nagarkot on BB Basis on a Twin/Triple sharing basis.
  • Kathmandu – Nagarkot – Kathmandu by Private Vehicle
  • Daily breakfast at the hotel.
  • All sightseeing/activities are by private vehicle as per the itinerary.
details: Enjoy the majestic Nepal tour package only at BDT. 12970
